title: Re-modeled 3BD Corner Apartment in Central Lower Nob Hill Location
posting_body: ['1086 Post St., #416', 'This top floor, corner-unit, 3-bedroom apartment, has been renovated from top to bottom, and features an open concept living space.', 'The updated kitchen features black granite counters, and stainless steel appliances (matching refrigerator, gas burning stove/oven and hood vent) and full-sized sink, with plenty of new custom cabinets, and enough room for a dining table.', 'The bathroom features large-panel, marble tile on the walls, with darker designer tiles on the floor, and includes a new pedestal sink, and a classic full bathtub/shower combination.', 'The full-size rear bedroom with closet looks out onto a quiet courtyard.', 'The two smaller bedrooms are separated by a partial wall to allow fresh air and more light - one of which has a window, the other a closet.', 'And there is another good sized hall closet, in entry foyer space opposite the bathroom.', 'The beautiful, light bamboo-wood floors throughout the apartment are further enhanced by an abundance of fresh air and natural light, that shines through windows located in every room of the unit, keeping the unit bright and feeling fresh.', 'LOCATION:', 'Location, location, location!', 'Want to live in one of the best neighborhoods in all of San Francisco, Nob Hill?', '1086', 'Post St. #203 has a walk score of 99 out of 100- Prime location!', "This studio apartment is located in the heart of the City, just one block away from some of the best food, music venues and historical landmarks, not to mention living just a few blocks away from some of the City's best parks!", 'And access to multiple MUNI bus lines is just one block away.', '- A few blocks from Lafayette Park', '- 2 blocks from Yoga Works, Pilates Studios', '- 8 min walk from Macondres, Fiorella and 24 Hour Fitness', "- 10 min walk to Whole Foods, Trader Joe's", '- 15 min walk to Crissy Field, Fort Mason, Golden Gate Bridge', '- 20 min walk to Golden Gate Park', 'DETAILS:', 'Rent: $2595', 'Deposit: $2595', 'Bed: 3', 'Bath: 1', 'Lease Term: 12-Months', '*', 'No utilities included', '* Pet Friendly!', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', 'Credit Score 650+', 'Monthly Gross Income 2.5x Rent', 'Positive References', 'CONTACT:', 'Ryan Daroca', 'Leasing Agent', 'show contact info', 'Structure Properties, Inc.', '100 Green Street, San Francisco, CA 94111', '<URL>', 'CalDRE# 01961414', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.']
